code.setup:
// initialize the lcd
{{varname}}.begin(LCD_COLUMNS, LCD_ROWS, LCD_ADDRESS, BACKLIGHT);
code.snippetCode:
// The LCD Screen will display the text of your choice.
{{varname}}.clear();                          // Clear LCD screen.
{{varname}}.selectLine(2);                    // Set cursor at the begining of line 2
{{varname}}.print("    Circuito.io  ");                   // Print print String to LCD on first line
{{varname}}.selectLine(3);                    // Set cursor at the begining of line 3
{{varname}}.print("      Rocks!  ");                   // Print print String to LCD on second line
delay(1000);
